players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. I suggest we focus on finding out who the detective is, as they might know more about the situation."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafioso, and I suggest we lynch him."
